title: Want in on nanotechnology? Capitalize on collaborative environments

title_detail.value: Want in on nanotechnology? Capitalize on collaborative environments

summary: Patent law experts demonstrate that private-public partnerships lead to promising innovation output measured in patents. Collaborations between private entities and public institutions have the potential to improve technology transfer in nanotechnology. Nations entering the nano-space can capitalize on collaborative environments, developing frameworks and close institutional networks between entities active in nanotechnology.
